roleset.name: incapable of being explained, understood
roleset.note: INCOMPREHENSIBLE-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from incomprehensible.01-j)

role.descr: person, entity incapable of understanding X

example.name: Both args
example.text: What I hope will happen here is that people will come along to present the case FOR allowing the names to be made public , because it is incomprehensible to me -
